channel.title: Comments on: A Visit to SOE

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description:
Lucky!!! Did ya boost anything?
I'd "borrow" a pencil, put it in an acrylic display case and take the Unholy Pencil of EverQuest Evil on tour for all to see. "Look closely, it still radiates malice! ... Ok, that's enough, move along, there's a long line behind you."
item.content:encoded:
Lucky!!! Did ya boost anything?

I’d “borrow” a pencil, put it in an acrylic display case and take the Unholy Pencil of EverQuest Evil on tour for all to see. “Look closely, it still radiates malice! … Ok, that’s enough, move along, there’s a long line behind you.”

item.title: By: Alice
item.dc:creator: Alice
item.description: Those are my grubby mitts clinging onto the sketches of the infernal Warren...
item.content:encoded: Those are my grubby mitts clinging onto the sketches of the infernal Warren…
